text: This is an extremely inferior product. Six of the coffee pods were broken open with grounds pouring out of the box. The remaining pods were ALL stale even though the use by date on the box was  December 2012. All went in the trash. I'll never buy from  Brooklyn Bean Roastery again.  Also, I bought two different coffees  (French Roast and  Fuhgeddaboutit). Both boxes of 36 each were in the same sub standard condition.
